info.brief_description: Women from the US Womans National Soccer team become giantesses and are in playful moods
info.description:
A few woman from the US Womans National Soccer team have become giantesses by either you shrinking and they find you or they grow and the find their way to your town. They are in very playful moods with the tiny people around and with eachother.

This story is a playful story, no killing please.

things that i encourage:
ass
fart
feet
mouth
swallow (but is alive)

things i don't want:
killing
rampaging
destruction
no male giants

other than that, try to have correct spelling and have fun with it! Please ADD!
